channel.title: Halving on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Halving on Archive 03

item.title: Zcash ($ZEC) Hits All-Time High: What Kind of Coin Is It?
item.description: Zcash ($ZEC) is drawing market attention with a 400% surge in just one month. As the leader of privacy coins, optimism surrounding the potential of zero-knowledge proof technology clashes sharply with pessimism warning of strong regulatory risks and a potential bubble collapse.

item.title: The Bitcoin 4-Year Cycle: Is It Still Valid?
item.description: The long-held belief in Bitcoin’s ‘4-year halving cycle’ is being challenged. With the pre-halving all-time high in 2024 and massive institutional inflows, the market environment is different. Arguments for ’the cycle is dead’ and ‘it’s still valid’ are fiercely debated. Three AI assistants analyze this hot topic with data.
